title: IT Career Exploration Project: Career Preparation Through Industry-Linked Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic IT literacy and general educational proficiency
context.additional_context: Providing IT career exploration opportunities for current employees and career changers.

learning_goals: Learners enhance job competencies by completing three or more collaborative projects that solve real-world IT industry problems
Learners clearly understand five or more career options in the IT field by attending eight expert-led guest sessions
Learners create and present personalized career roadmaps using self-assessment tools
Learners gain hands-on collaboration experience with real companies by participating in hackathon-style practical events
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
